name: actions_get-actions-cache-usage-policy-for-enterprise
description:
Gets the GitHub Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise.
You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope to use this endpoint.
GitHub Apps must have the `enterprise_administration:write` permission to use this endpoint.

enterprise.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

$block.$h1: Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise

$block: GitHub Actions cache usage policy for an enterprise.

$ul: **max_repo_cache_size_limit_in_gb**: For repositories in an enterprise, the maximum value that can be set as the limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.
**repo_cache_size_limit_in_gb**: For repositories in an enterprise, the default size limit for the sum of all caches in a repository, in gigabytes.
